name: SCP Infection - Emotional Support
description:
Luke receives an unusual message from his work boss while on vacation. Downloading a document from his work emails puts a target on his back as an evil spirit seems to swarm him and break reality as we know it. 

Will Luke survive his misadventure or will he doom the world and himself in his misuse of company resources? 

This game is inspired by the SCP Universe. Any similarity to existing works is purely coincidental and unintentional.

 Legal: Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and concepts originate from http://www.scp-wiki.net/ and its authors. This video, being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0. (edited)
